action.name: Poison Quill
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 5/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Defensive Spines
entries: The puckwudgie's spines face backwards, giving it an edge in defense, but hindering its offense. It's poison quill attacks are always made at Disadvantage.

reaction.name: Defensive Spines
entries: Whenever the puckwudgie is attacked in melee it can use a reaction to turn itself and have the attacker hit the spines, dealing 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The ursa can move through other creatures as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ursa makes two claw attacks and one bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) force damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) force damage.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points except through Consume.

trait.name: Musical Weakness
entries: Parasprites are attracted to and {@condition charmed} by music. They have disadvantage on all saving throws against Bard spells. In addition, anyone may attempt a Charisma check using a musical instrument contested by the Swarm's Intelligence. On a failure, the swarm is {@condition charmed} by the performer.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 4d4 + 2}) piercing damage if the swarm has more than half of its HP remaining. 7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) damage otherwise.

action.name: Consume
entries: The swarm consumes any crops or food inside its space. If its at full HP, this creates another identical swarm of parasprites. If it is at more than half HP, this heals it for 18 ({@dice 4d8}) HP. If it is at less than half HP, this heals it for 9 ({@dice 2d8}) HP.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The maulwurf has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Physical Magic Resistance
entries: The maulwurf's thick hide gives it advantage on strength, dexterity and constitution saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The maulwurf makes two claw attacks and one bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the diamond dog reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the diamond dog can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

trait.name: Delver
entries: The diamond dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks while underground.

trait.name: Firearms Knowledge
entries: The diamond dog ignores the loading property of its musket.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The diamond dog makes two attacks one of which can be a bite.

action.name: Musket
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +4} to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d12+2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Frag Grenade {@recharge 5}
entries: The diamond dog throws a grenade up to 60 feet, and the grenade explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Diamond dogs are canine miners and slavers. Lazy and cruel, they tend to kidnap ponies to work in their mines. They're not stupid, having used elemental earth magic to both increase their mining efficiency and invent a form of gunpowder. But the laziness of their culture has invited stagnation.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the diamond dog reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the diamond dog can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

trait.name: Delver
entries: The diamond dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks while underground.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The diamond dog makes two attacks one of which can be a bite.

action.name: Pickaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage. This attack deals double damage to objects.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Mining Explosive {@recharge 5}
entries: The diamond dog sets a mining explosive. At the start of his next turn, the dynamite explodes in a 20 foot radius sphere. Each creature in the area must make a DC13 dexterity saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 3d6}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Unattended objects in the area take double damage from the explosion.

Diamond dogs are canine miners and slavers. Lazy and cruel, they tend to kidnap ponies to work in their mines. They're not stupid, having used elemental earth magic to both increase their mining efficiency and invent a form of gunpowder. But the laziness of their culture has invited stagnation.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sea serpent makes two attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapon
entries: The sea serpent exhales a 30 ft. line of water. Creatures in the area must make a Strength saving throw (DC16). On a failure they take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage and are knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, they take half the bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The sea serpent can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The sea serpent deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Inherit Accuracy
entries: The slingtail's ranged attacks ignore cover. Being in melee range of an enemy doesn't give the slingtail disadvantage on its ranged attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slingtail makes 3 attacks, one of which can be a boulder throw.

action.name: Boulder Throw
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 90/300 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) damage. A flying creature hit by this attack must make a Strength saving throw {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) damage against {@condition prone} targets.

trait.name: Stench (Hezrou)
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the bufogren must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to any bufogren's stench for 24 hours.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The bufogren has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The bufogren can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bufogren's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Mutliattack
entries: The bufogren makes 3 attacks, one of which can be a tongue lash attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tongue Lash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.  A hit target is automatically {@condition grappled} by the bufogren. The bufogren cannot use this attack if it has a creature {@condition grappled} by its tongue.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The bufogren makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the bufogren, and it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage at the start of each of the bufogren's turns. The bufogren can have only one creature swallowed at a time. If the bufogren dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Poison Breath
entries: The bufogren exhales poison gas in a 60 foot cone. All creatures within the area other than another bufogren must make a constitution saving throw ({@dc 15}). On a failure, they take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage and become {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The timberwolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the timberwolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The timberwolf has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: The timberwolf deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the timberwolf that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the timberwolf doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

Carnivorous plants in canine form, Timber Wolves stalk the deep forests of Equestria, preying on anypony they can catch. Organized into highly effective packs by their Alphas, outnumbered ponies have trouble dealing with these menaces. However, Timber Wolves fear fire. Even a simple torch will keep them at bay. Woodswise pony rangers will always keep a torch at hoof's reach for these ever present threats.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The alpha has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the alpha's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The alpha has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The alpha regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If the alpha takes fire damage this trait doesn't function at the start of the alpha's next turn.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, the alpha deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the alpha that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the alpha doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The alpha makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage.  If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}

action.name: Absorb
entries: The alpha can absorb another timber wolf to gain 10 HP, or the timber wolf's remaining HP, which ever is greater. This also gives the alpha resistance to fire damage for the rest of it's turn.

Carnivorous plants in canine form, Timber Wolves stalk the deep forests of Equestria, preying on anypony they can catch. Organized into highly effective packs by their Alphas, outnumbered ponies have trouble dealing with these menaces. However, Timber Wolves fear fire. Even a simple torch will keep them at bay. Woodswise pony rangers will always keep a torch at hoof's reach for these ever present threats.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The cragodile can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cragodile makes two attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC19).

action.name: Tail Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The wurm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wurm makes three tentacle attacks.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage. A hit creature is grappled automatically by the wurm.

action.name: Swallow
entries: All Large or smaller creatures grappled by the wurm must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be swallowed. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tatzlwurm, and it takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the tatzlwurm's turns. If the tatzlwurm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tatzlwurm must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the tatzlwurm. If the tatzlwurm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The wurm exhales acid in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Bug Bear
languages: Bug Bears can communicate via pheromones

trait.name: Multi-Armed Abomination
entries: The Bug Bear can make 2 reactions and object interactions per turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Bug Bear makes three attacks, two claw attacks and one Sting attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage and the target must make a DC18 Dexterity (Acrobatics) or Strength (Athletics) ability check, or be {@condition grappled}. The Bug Bear can only grapple 2 creatures at a time.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage and the target must make a DC15 Constitution saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 5d8}) Poison damage, half on a success. This attack has advantage on a creature the Bug Bear has {@condition grappled}.

reaction.name: Honed Reflexes
entries: The bugbear can make a Claw attack in response to being hit with an attack.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The werebat can use its action to polymorph into a bat-equinoid hybrid or into a bat, or back into its true form, which is equinoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The werebat has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The werebat can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, the werebat deals an extra 18 ({@dice 6d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the werebat that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the werebat doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The werebat makes two attacks, one of which can be a bite.

action.name: Bite (hyrid or bat form only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.  If the target is a equinoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werebat lycanthropy.

action.name: Hoof Crossbow (equinoid form only)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hoof Blade (hybrid or equinoid form only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Cunning Stealth
entries: The werebat can attempt to Hide or Disengage as a bonus action.

A character that becomes a werebat gains a Dexterity of 17 if his or her score isn't already higher, blindsight (echolocation) with a range of 120 feet, a flying speed of 40 while in hybrid or bat form, and a +2 bonus to AC while in bat or hybrid form (from natural armor). Attack and damage rolls for the natural weapons are based on the character's Dexterity.

trait.name: Warrior of Sunlight
entries: Celestia's weapon attacks are magical. When Celestia hits with any weapon or spell attack, she deals an extra {@dice 6d8} radiant damage.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Celestia knows if she hears a lie.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Celestia makes two Longsword or Lightning Spear attacks.

action.name: Flying Sword
entries: Celestia releases her longsword to hover magically in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. If Celestia can see the sword, Celestia can mentally command it as a bonus action to fly up to 50 feet and either make one attack against a target or return to Celestia's hands. If the hovering sword is targeted by any effect, Celestia is considered to be holding it. The hovering sword falls if Celestia dies.

action.name: Healing Touch (4/day)
entries: Celestia touches another creature. The target magically regains 40 ({@dice 8d8 + 4}) hitpoints and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness or deafness.

action.name: Lightning Spear
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 17} to hit, range 120/120 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 1d10 + 10}) lightning damage, plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) slashing damage, plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) radiant damage.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Celestia magically teleports along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet in any direction.

legendary.name: Searing Burst
entries: Celestia emits magical, divine energy. Each creature of her choice in a 10 foot radius must make a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Blinding Gaze
entries: Celestia targets one creature she can see within 30 ft. of her. If the target can see her, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until magic such as the Lesser Restoration spell removes the blindness.

trait.name: Warrior of Moonlight
entries: Luna's weapon attacks are magical. When Luna hits with any weapon or spell attack, she deals an extra {@dice 6d8} radiant damage.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Luna knows if she hears a lie.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Luna makes two Glaive or Moonbow attacks.

action.name: Moonbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +16} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d8 + 9}) piercing damage plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) radiant damage. If the target is a creature that has 100 hit points or fewer, it must succeed on a {@dc 23} saving throw or die.

action.name: Crescent Moon Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) slashing damage, plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (4/day)
entries: Luna touches another creature. The target magically regains 40 ({@dice 8d8 + 4}) hitpoints and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness or deafness.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Luna magically teleports along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet in any direction.

legendary.name: Freezing Burst
entries: Luna emits magical, divine energy. Each creature of her choice in a 10 foot radius must make a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Blinding Gaze
entries: Luna targets one creature she can see within 30 ft. of her. If the target can see her, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until magic such as the Lesser Restoration spell removes the blindness.

variant.name: Nightmare
entries: To transform Princess Luna into the Nightmare, Change her alignment to Lawful Evil, change the radiant damage she deals to necrotic, she gains Legendary Resistance and replace her healing touch with the following:

Voice of Fear (1/Day). The Nightmare utters a dreadful word of power. Each creature that can hear her must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of her for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that saves against this effect is immune to his Fearful Voice for 24 hours.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the changeling has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the changeling scores against a {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the changeling is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the changeling instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The changeling can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium equinoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its speed, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, the changeling deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the changeling that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the changeling doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The changeling makes two attacks.

action.name: Hoofblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage and the target must make a DC15 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage and becoming {@condition poisoned} on a fail, and taking half the poison damage on a success.

action.name: Hoofbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage and the target must make a DC17 Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage on a fail.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: As a bonus action, the changeling may attempt to Hide, Disengage, or Dodge.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The changeling is an innate spellcaster, using Charisma (Spell Save {@dc 13}, Spell Attack Modifier +5) for the following spells.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The changeling is an innate spellcaster, using Charisma (Spell Save {@dc 11}, Spell Attack Modifier +3) for the following spells.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The changeling can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium equinoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size and speeds, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The changeling makes two attacks, or casts {@spell emotion drain|mlpplaneshift} and then makes one attack.

action.name: Hoof Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4+2}) slashing damage.
